program.description: <span style="color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">Start using the #1 Free Classifieds App!</span><br style="color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);"><span style="color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">The best way to buy and sell 'on the go' and in your local area.</span><p style="border:0px;margin:0px 0px 5px;padding:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">OLX allows you to easily post your ads for free and search for classified ads in your local area. Whether it is a flat screen TV, mobile phones, electronics, used cars, an apartment to rent, or a second-hand piece of furniture, OLX provides you with millions of buyers and sellers to connect to, all for free!</p><p style="border:0px;margin:0px 0px 5px;padding:0px;color:rgb(51,51,51);font-family:Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;background-color:rgb(245,245,245);">• Super simple ad posting: take a picture with your phone camera, describe your ad and sell it.<br>• Easily search and browse for classifieds around you using your phone's location.<br>• Manage your ads, favorites and messages on the go with "My OLX"<br>• Share your ads with everyone through Facebook, Whatsapp, Twitter, etc.</p>

program.name: Play-logic-games - CO - Non Incent
program.description: Welcome to Play-logic-games&nbsp; new campaign for Colombia! This program allows you the best payout for Colombia, with new and exciting products!Conversion is made By Server to Server Live Reporting! Play-logic-games&nbsp; is a leading Mobile entertainment brand focused on competition based services with high pay outs for affiliates. Our competition services create great opportunities for the end users and therefore have a very high conversion rates from clicks to sales. Play-logic-games&nbsp; believes that in order to bring the best traffic to its landing pages, we should highly incentivize our affiliates; and therefore offers the best pay outs for any sales, with the most advanced tracking system that enable the affiliate to monitor the exact conversions from clicks to leads to sales.User flow: Pincode (MT flow)
program.restrictions: <span style="color:rgb(102,102,102);background-color:rgb(255,255,255);">CO Traffic Only.</span><br style="margin:0px;padding:0px;color:rgb(102,102,102);"><br style="margin:0px;padding:0px;color:rgb(102,102,102);"><span style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Banners can not say:: You are a winner, or you win. We can use them only with the word "can" , like" You can win" , you can be a winner and etc.</span><br><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">The affiliate shall not generate traffic through the following distribution methods: phishing, spamming or the use of spiders or robots.</span><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Usage of the word “FREE” or words with the same or similar meaning are not allowed in conjunction with any of the<br>Trivicell campaigns. Additionally, creative’s used in conjunction with any Trivicell offers may not be<br>misleading or deceptive.&nbsp;<br>The following words and words with the same or similar meaning shall NOT be used:<br>• Click here to claim your prize<br>• Only X prizes left!<br>• Only X minutes left!!<br>• FREE/ free<br>• Congratulations! You have won an XXX!<br>• You are the winner of an XXX!<br>• Daily winner!<br>• Collect your XXX!<br>• You are selected to receive a free XXXX<br>• Guaranteed prize</p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Pop up/under publishers must cap traffic at 40k pops daily until receiving feedback that they can increase"</p>
